name: Kristene Geering
what_you_do: Kristene Geering offers parent coaching services to help parents navigate the challenges of parenting, providing support through 1:1 coaching sessions both virtually and in-person.
who_you_serve: Kristene serves parents who are feeling overwhelmed and seeking guidance in their parenting journey, primarily targeting individuals in the San Francisco Bay Area and online clients.
signature_programs: Harmony at Home, From Struggles to Cuddles, Loving Limits Strategy Session
business_focus: Kristene Geering offers parent coaching services to help parents navigate the challenges of parenting, providing support through 1:1 coaching sessions both virtually and in-person.
